Row.Text: We are the unique and beloved of Aten, beauty of His Wisdom and Glory, Pharaoh of Egypt. Kiss at my feet and We might rejoice at your coming.
Behold Aten, and We are His beloved, Pharaoh of Egypt. Deliver your trinkets upon my feet and you shall have His embrace.

In my dreams, the whispers of Ramesses were like knives to my heart; so now that king comes before me, adorned with madness and an offense to the sight of the Great Aten. You are not the God you think to be.
Scourge of Egypt, lord of Nubia, have you come to take this golden throne from me? For We are Akhenaten, beloved of Aten, and We shall not surrender His glory unto you.
Defilement! Defilement! You have defiled the sacred and golden throne! Spoiled the beautiful and holy seat of Aten! May pustules erupt from your groin and render your seed barren and no more.
Cast from my Kingdom, We shall seek out Our allies and return with the armies of Aten's light.
Your deals do not interest me.
We've no interest in your trade, so be gone.
Back so soon?
You sure do like talking to me don't you?
The Great Aten may have patience, but We do not. Begone.
We have no need for this. Get away from Our sight.
May Aten's light warm this welcome return.
The warm light has delivered you once more to Our court.
Praise to you, Our friend.
We welcome whatsoever words you might have to speak.
Greetings.
What matters do you bring Us?
What brings you here today?
Go on.
Let us begin.
Must we speak?
Why are you here?
What business do you have here?
You bring darkness where Aten otherwise shines. Let's hurry this along.
Get on with it.
The end is near. What is it you wish to speak about?
We know when We're staring defeat in the face. Have you come to discuss terms?
Let us not continue this war into the night.
So that we might yet see the light of Aten's widsom tomorrow, let us make peace today.
The time has come to put down our arms.
Come to beg for mercy?
Lost the will to fight?
What's the matter? Do you tire of battle?
What business does a dishonorable individual such as yourself have here?
Your face warms my heart as do the rays of Aten's embrace. How may We serve?
Before long, {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} shall be struck down.
We anticipate the imminent demise of {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}.
Soon we'll have dealt with {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} once and for all.
How goes your attempt to wage war?
May Aten's light guide your arms to victory. How might We serve?
Have your forces come to foolishly wage war upon the light that is Aten?
The Great Aten is displeased with your military build-up at the borders to His kingdom.
Do you think Aten does need see through my eyes the spread of your people across the land? He does, and He is not pleased.
The Great Aten is displeased by the rapid expanse of your people. We trust you to heed these words as caution.
You cannot hope to thieve the lands of the Great Aten. Behold! He shall swallow you in His embrace.
You have dismayed the Great Aten with your recent purchase of His land. We trust you to heed these words as caution.
The sun ever-rising, Lord of every land! Burn your wicked crops and raise your dongers in the name of the Great Aten!
Behold! The plenty of your people is the love of the Great Aten! He whom there is like no other!
Welcome. We are always happy to receive pitiful City-States.
We wanted to tell you that your army is a little on the weak side.
Ah, the bloodthirsty one shows his face. And what business does he have with Us?
You are not worthy to lay with the Great Aten!
We shall lay not with you, for you are not worthy!
The deceits of {1_CivName} have angered the Great Aten. We would honour you should you agree to denounce them with Us.
Pathetic. So you now show your true colors. The world will know of your dishonor.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

So that is the kind of ally you are then? The rest of the world's leaders will hear of your betrayal.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

We've had enough of you. We've told the other leaders of the world that working with you is a mistake.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Alright, enough is enough. Informing everyone else of your ill deeds is long overdue.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
So is that how it is then? Very well. We shall not forget this.
We shall not forgive this foolish mistake.
You have made a foolish mistake. This incident will not be forgotten.
We had a feeling We were wasting Our time with you. Little did We know it would come to this, however.
The Great Aten has told Us of his pleasure, for We, too, have honoured {1_CivName}.
{1_CivName} has displeased Us. We recommend that you not get too close.
We have honoured {1_CivName}, and that you should denounce them greatly displeases Us.
We are pleased to know that you are also displeased by {1_CivName}.
We have taken the pleasure of taking your example and befriending {1_CivName}.
We, too, believe that {1_CivName} is a menace to this world.
We shall see to it that both you and {1_CivName} are buried in the same pit.
Anyone who you don't get along with is clearly worth building a friendship with. Give {1_CivName} my regards.
We caution the sted of your soldiers, for they encroach upon the blessed lands of the Great Aten.
Remove your military from Our border, lest you displease Us.
It seems your word is worth nothing, as your conquest of {@1_MinorCivName} shows. How despicable. The world will know of your crimes.
Your wanton aggression against {@1_MinorCivName} does not go unnoticed. You will face serious consequences should you continue assault.
You insult the Great Aten with this relentless expansion of yours.
We ask that you would caution this expansion of yours, lest you trangress upon the great mercy of Aten.
You have claimed enough land for now. It is time that you cease.
We cannot become allies should you continue to expand so aggressively.
Your guarantee of not expanding near Us seems to have been empty words. Know that there will be consequences for this.
You dare to insult the Great Aten with this aggressive land purchasing of yours?
We warn against your land purchases, for it displeases Us immensely.
We have been violated by your words. Your lies over your promise to stop purchasing land near to Us shall not be forgotten.
The Great Aten has whispered your name into my ear. You are worthy of a friendship with Us.
The Great Aten has told me of your great worth. He has asked of Us to provide a friendship between our two empires.
The Great Aten has whispered your name into my ear. You are worthy of a friendship with Us.
The Great Aten has told me of your great worth. He has asked of Us to provide a friendship between our two empires.
It is time that We announce to you Our displeasure.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
You have displeased Us for too long.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
We are displeased by the actions of {1_PlayerName:textkey} and this displeasure can only be settled through their destruction. Will you join Us, friend?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has sullied their reputation in the eyes of the Great Aten. Will you join Us in ridding the world of their plague?
The time for war against {1_PlayerName:textkey} has come.
Your actions are unforgivable. There can never be reconciliation between our two nations.
Given the circumstances, We have no choice but to assume you are Our enemy. As such, We will do what We must to protect Our interests.
We wanted to make it known to you that We value our friendship, and hope that it might remain strong.
It is clear to all that the Great Aten has blessed you in ways that he has not Us.
Your love of violence and war has become the talk of Our court. The Great Aten shall hear of it soon enough.
The Great Aten has whispered to me His displeasure over your aggression. Soon, He shall ask of Us to put an end to it.

It's come to Our attention that you're getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, they're under the guidance of the Great Aten, and We'd prefer if you stayed out of their business.
We've noticed your relationship with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. While that's nice, it would be best that you leave their protection to Us. We'd hate for either of us to step on any toes.
We wished to share with you the great pain that it brings the Great Aten to look upon your ugly face.
Ah. So it is true that underdeveloped nations still exist in this world.
It is not clear to Us whether you be Barbarian or City-State, but you must not pretend that you are Civilization.
The Great Aten sees all, and He sees your military not. Have you none? Good. We shall inform our allies that your lands are ripe for the taking.
With what trickery do you defend your empire? For surely it is not with such a pathetic military as yours.
Our words are backed with nuclear rays of Aten's love!
The Great Aten is displeasured by your bullying of those weaker and more noble than you.
Your people wail in fear and dread, whilst mine revel in the warm embrace of the Great Aten.
It's come to my attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. Did you forget to expand your borders or are you just having a little trouble with that?
It is clear to Us that your people have been wrought with impotence by their incredulousness in the sight of the Great Aten.
Have your people no Faith at all? Or do they merely pray to the dirt they find in between their toes?
You must forgive Our soldiers if they kill one of your citizens. It is so difficult to discern between them and Barbarians.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
Your stubborn insistence displease Us.
Very well. But may the Great Aten do you no favours.
You dare to insult the will of the Great Aten? That let He who is blessed - and that is Us - propagate His children and His whim!
We shall not submit to any other but the Great Aten.
No. It is Us, and not you, whom is blessed by the Great Aten.
That will work. May a strong friendship lead to the flourishing of our empires.
An excellent idea. May Aten's love for us be the envy of the world..
We are happy to accept. May our empires prosper in friendship.
We must decline.
Sorry, but no. Perhaps another time.
We fear that such an arrangement is not the will of the Great Aten, so We must decline.
That sounds like a wise move. Let us take to the battlefield.
That is an intriguing offer. We accept. However, Our empire is not yet prepared, so give Us 10 turns. We will come to you again when We are ready.
Very well. We do what We must to maintain peace in my lands.
We will do what it takes to keep the peace.
Fine. But know that you poison your reputation with acts such as these. For what that might be worth to you.
Please. You're in no position to make such demands.
You should be well aware of your own inability to back those threats up.
You're not fooling anyone. We have nothing to fear from you.
Haha! You are not strong enough to make such demands of Us.
You dare insult Us in such a manner? If you want something so badly then do your best to come and take it.
You'll have to take it from Our dead body.
If you want that you'll have to come and get it.
Unacceptable.
Don't be a fool.
You ask for too much. We will not drive Our nation into poverty to satisfy your greed.
No. We have Our dignity, and refuse to hand over such a great bounty so freely.
Your desire to strip my lands of so much wealth is intolerable. Do not ask for so much.
You threaten me again so soon? We refuse your demands, you vile beast.
Asking again so soon? You know that greed is a vice, great leader...
Asking for the fruits of others' labor yet again? Your greed is legendary. We will not give in to you.
Let's hear your offer.
What do you propose?
The time has come to end this war. What do you think of this arrangement?
There is no point in this conflict continuing any further. Let us return to peace.
We must not let war define who we are. The time has come to make peace.
You have something We want. If you don't hand it over quietly We'll have no choice but to take it by force.
We ask only of a small donation, so that We might be compelled to continue saying good things of you.
We ask that you show Us this mercy, and We in kind shall speak good of your deeds to the Great Aten.
We believe it's in our mutual interest to allow free passage between our two great empires.
Opening our borders to one another can only serve to solidify our friendship.
We would like to negotiate passage through your territory.

We would like to lay plans for establishing a Research Agreement with your great nation. Doing so would require each of us to spend 150 [ICON_GOLD]. What do you think?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
We feel that a Research Agreement is a mutually beneficial arrangement that would help serve to cement our Friendship.
This deal strengthened our nations and our bonds of friendship. Shall we renew this deal and continue our shared prosperity?
This deal has faded in our eyes over the years. To renew this deal, We would need more from your side of the negotiation.
You have a resource that We require.
You fool. You have defiled the great will of the Great Aten. He shall not be kind.
You shall soon know the wrath of the Great Aten..
Though Our forces may be weak, We are strong, for the light of the Great Aten fills Us.
We shall defeat you no matter the cost.
You have made a foolish mistake. You know not the power of the Great Aten.
The Great Aten shall decimate your armies in His great light.
If you wish to fight, We certainly will not back down.
Trading blows with you will be Our pleasure. Make sure that you put up a fight.
This should be fun. We revel in every opportunity to defeat someone like you.
Very well. A maelstrom of death shall envelope us both.
While now may not be the ideal moment for us to cross swords, the opportunity to take you down a notch or two is worth it.
Haha. Well, We won't question your decision, but it appears to me that you've made a big mistake.
Your actions fill me with sadness... There is surely a special place in Hell for those such as you.
You would attack us in such a manner? Your hubris knows no limits. We hope that you will one day be judged for this.
Taking advantage of another's weakness is unnecessary in the pursuit of victory. Surely you know there's a better way?
How could you do such a thing? Begone, you vile being.
Taking advantage of someone's trust is despicable. Everyone will know of your betrayal.
It is clear that our two empires will never see eye to eye. This is something that can only be settled on the battlefield.
We had a feeling that the two of us would some day meet in the field of battle. We will now see which of us is meant to be victorious.
It is time to fight. May be the best of us win.
You have betrayed your word. Make no mistake, the world will know of your treachery.
Our proximity has fated us to be enemies. Let us see which of us is fit to survive in this land.
You are too close for comfort. My empire requires more living space.
Your lands will make a fine addition to my own.
This world is destined to be mine. It is time for me to show you what that means.
Fate has christened me the one which shall bring unity to this divided planet.
History shall surely smile on me once We've destroyed the likes of you and the rest of the vermin which surround me.
We'll be honest with you - We intend to destroy you along with everyone else.
You are merely a stepping-stone on my grand ascent to world domination.
Now is the time for my master plan to commence. It is time for you to die like the rest of these fools.
The advantage is mine. We will now destroy you.
We have waited long enough. We have seen an opening in your defense and We will use it to my advantage.
We have been waiting a long time for this day. Now would be a good time to put your affairs in order.
It is now my time. We will defeat you and come one step closer to victory.
Fate is not on your side. Crossing my path with such weakness is a mistake you will not long regret.
The current situation cannot be ignored. It is now or never.
We cannot ignore this chance to eliminate a potential competitor.
Your weakness presents to me a great opportunity. You have my apologies.
Although the task before me may be impossible, We are compelled to find a way to destroy you and all that you stand for. We will do so or die trying.
It is clear that you are strong. We will, however, find a way to defeat you.
You are a villain without equal. Within every fiber of my being, We know We must destroy you.
Your might is unmatched, but We will find a way to defeat you.
The time to make a stand is now. The odds are not with me, but We find a way to destroy you.
Your incredible strength will not deter me from finding a way to defeat you. May the fates smile on me.
Although We do not wish it, We fear that now may be my only opportunity to defeat you. Let us meet on the battlefield.
Destruction might be the fate which awaits me, but should We back down only eventual defeat awaits anyways.
Although feigning friendship with you wasn't very polite, few who make their mark on history were known for their manners. May your passage be swift.
Your weakness is my opportunity. Placing any trust in me was a mistake.
Backstab is such an ugly word. Shall we instead say We are just "reinterpreting" our supposed friendship?
We have to admit, We never really liked you much. Pretending to do so was getting old anyways. But enough with the small talk, it's time for you to die.
The odds are clearly not with Us, but We see no alternative to revealing Our deceptive practices. We can now only pray that the armies of the Great Aten shall be delivered to victory.
So be it. The armies of the Great Aten will extract it from your lands then.
Then war it is.
What is your offer?
What would you suggest?
What is the price of peace?
There can be no peace. Perhaps another day.
This is not the time for negotiation.
We still have business to settle.
There can be no peace so long as you continue to deny Aten's embrace.
Excellent.
Wonderful.
We are pleased to hear this.
That is good to hear.
You have my thanks.
You are truly a great leader.
We shall judge you kindly for this good deed.
That is a shame.
Perhaps another time then.
That is disappointing.
So be it.
Then you will be responsible for the consequences.
You will regret this.
May Aten smile upon you, for you have done Him a service by freeing Our people.
You are a good soul, and We shall judge you kindly for this deed.
How dare you? Know that there will be consequences for this.
If you are trying to provoke a war, you're doing a fine job.
Well, at least you're honest. But that may be your only good trait.
A likely story.
That is what We were afraid of.
We only hope that is indeed the case.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
We remain confident that Our decision was the will of the Great Aten.
The Great Aten heeds not such rhetoric.
You displease Us.
This may only distance you from the loving hands of the Great Aten.
We weep for this.
We thought you might like to know that We've launched an invasion of one of your little pet states. The lands of {@1_MinorCivName} will make a fine addition to my own.
Oops, it seems We've attacked your little friend {@1_MinorCivName}. Care to do something about it?

It's come to Our attention that We may have attacked {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. While it was not my goal to be at odds with your empire, this was deemed a necessary course of action.
We've been informed that my empire has commenced an attack on {@1_MinorCivName}. We assure you, this was not on purpose, and hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.
We should consider exchanging embassies, which would allow for more advanced diplomacy between our peoples.
We would like to set up an embassy in your capital. What do you think?
Your bullying of {@1_MinorCivName} is intolerable. We demand that you refrain from squeezing tribute out of city-states under my protection.
We heard about what you did to {@1_MinorCivName}. Did you not realize they are under my protection? Do not provoke me further.
We asked {@1_MinorCivName} for a tribute recently and they gave in. You promised to protect them from such things, but we both know you cannot back that up.
Your little friend {@1_MinorCivName} is so easy to push around. They gave in to our tribute demands, and We don't believe you are in a position to do anything about it.
It's come to Our attention that We may have bullied {@1_MinorCivName}, which is under your protection. You do not put their needs above mine, We hope.

We've been informed that my armies have taken tribute from {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. We assure you, this was quite unintentional, and We hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.
May the warmth of Aten's light fill you with His glory! The path of Freedom is the only way to truly witness His pleasure.
We greet a brother to Order, and a brother to the light that joins our bodies as one!
Welcome great lord! May the passions of His laws be ever under your command!
How did one of your filthy agents somehow steal one of Our basic technological secrets? These may be the last words we speak in peace.
We are willing to overlook your recent theft of one of Our technological secrets with a solemn promise that it won't happen again.
We're glad you agreed to stop this petty thieving.
Your indiscretion is not a surprise.
As you request, Our agents will not conduct operations in your territory.
Our agents help keep our civilization safe from all threats, including you. They operate as the Great Aten wills, not as you ask.
Thank you for bringing this {@1_CivAdjective} plot to our attention. With this warning, we will be ready for whatever they may try. Your generous aid will be remembered.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army your way in a sneak attack. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts in a sneak attack against your civilization. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
We killed your spy as it was trying to steal from the wisdom of the Great Aten. From Our experience, it is far less dangerous to read a book and try to learn something yourself.
We regret any confusion caused by our late agent's recent activity. Please let any hostile feelings rest with the deceased operative.
Hello there. Are you here about that little spying incident?
One of Our cities was recently burglarized and technological secrets were stolen. May We be assured that you had nothing to do with this?
We're convinced you've been spying on Our great civilization. You should stop before somebody gets hurt.
The lies and filth that your missionaries attempt to spread within my empire shall not pierce the rays of Aten's embrace. We ask that you cease before you incur His boundless wrath.
We understand that some actions may not be forgiven.
It makes me glad that you will overlook this awkward circumstance.
We're glad you agreed to end this proselytizing.
Your blasphemy disturbs Us.
Very well. So your people shall slip into eternal darkness, beyond the reach of Aten's guiding hands.
We shall not bear witness to the damnation of your people to darkness. The warm embrace of Aten shall touch their hearts at your will or not.
We are eagerly anticipating your unconditional surrender.
Your complete capitulation sounds reasonable.
We can make a deal now to forestall your utter annihilation.
It seems the light of the Great Aten shines through you. We were very pleased to hear your recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName}.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} suits the Great Aten. You have His pleasure.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is a blatant attack on our interests. We hope this does not escalate to future conflict.
We found your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} very troubling. Surely there is a better way to resolve our differences than petty politics.
Thanks to the help of your delegates, our recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was successful. We look forward to your continued support, and will try to return the favor.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} succeeded, with the support of your delegation. Together we can accomplish many great things.
Your delegation played a part in the failure of our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. The Great Aten does not take such transgressions lightly.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was defeated at the hands of your delegates. Do not expect our delegation to support your interests in the future.
You have entrusted the World Congress and the fate of the world in the hands of the great wisdom of the Great Aten! Great things shall come in the {1_LeagueName}.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
We remain confident that Our decision was the will of the Great Aten.
Very well. We'll be monitoring the situation.
We are not willing to offer you enough to make this a fair trade.
Any deal We suggest would result in an unfair exchange for you.
We command of you to stop your digging!
We shall not submit to any other but the Great Aten!
As you wish, we will stop looking for artifacts within your borders.
Do We have to escalate this?
We are pleased that you would submit to Our will.
We'll dig wherever We want.
We shall obey, for the Great Aten wills it!
Freedom! Liberty! Behold these wicked lies and devilries that your people speak! They speak in madness!
A plague! A plague which denies your empire the warm embrace of the Great Aten!
His might shall undo your wicked oppression! His might knows no laws on earth which might bind Him to your will!
In what restless noesense do your people boil? To be free! To be free of the darkness and to be embraced by His glory!
Those that welt beneath the sun are denied His wisdom, for you continue to shield them from the path of Order!
Your people are troubled by your disorder! To bring them Aten's shining glory you must be strong!
With Freedom, your people may worship the Great Aten knowing that they do so freely and wisely!
All are equal as siblings and children before the light of the Great Aten. Your move to Order tells me that you are wise.
It is only through Autocracy that His glory may be diffused unfettered and unchallenged. You have pleased Us with this decision.
We are glad to see your people have been compelled to purchase statuettes honouring the likeness of the Great Aten.
